ovdesc.p: This work file holds the consolidated accrual figures generated from each multiprocessing thread. These records will be consolidated to update GROUP.ACCRUAL.BALANCES after all GROUP.ACCRUAL.DETAIL records have been processed by the EOD.GROUP.ACCRUAL batch job.
This file is used to eliminate locking contention by several batch multi thread jobs attempting to update the same balance record.
